comments.comment: Are you talking about indika? Is it true his first wife was sri lankan.

Your facts on OJ (Juice) is not accurate. OJ's case was a setup by the LAPD Dirty cops. OJ has nothing to do with it. Case was on the Race card from the beginning. OJ was sent to prison for trying to recover memorabilia that was stolen from him in Las Vegas. His prison sentence has nothing to do with the conspired double murder.

Tharanga, I knew him professionally. He never answered his phone after 5 pm. His excuse was "sorry, this is the time for my kids." As far as I know, he was a devoted father.

Absolute lies! When the truth comes out you will realise that you did not know Indika at all. His wife left him because he beat her. All this is already on record with the Police. His first Sri Lankan born wife and two other woman who he harassed also had to get restraining orders on him.

Western Australia has won the unflattering title of being the most racist and least happy state in Australia, according to a report published in 2019. Surveys have revealed that W.A recorded the highest dissatisfaction with immigration policies and also came in as the least happy state in Australia. I have lived there and felt that feeling number of times. Those white folks from WA can really bring you down with stupid white conservatism ideals. If you are going to 'date' Caucasians, learn to look beyond their skin colour and see their true colours.
yes true, they are not watching us as like US citizens.

Sorry Saranga, sad to hear how you feel. I am an individual of Sri Lankan origin and grew up in country WA since the age of 9 till I left in Aus in 2015 (22 years) and I have not faced what you have described above. I've worked in China, Singapore, UK, South Africa and now Canada, and I feel WA is a very tolerating and accepting place compared to some places I lived, worked and travelled. I truly don't believe the challenges Indika faced had much to do with WA but rather specific to individuals involved.

I completely disagree. I have lived on five continents (Aisa, Europe, N. America and Oceania) and am now living in WA. Racism in WA is so deep-rooted that you wouldn't be able to catch it unless you are highly trained in spotting systemic ethno-demographical slow violence of supremacy.

Doesn't matter the colour of your skin. If you beat your wife and harass other women you will get in trouble with the law. Indika Gunathilaka punched my daughter in the face, stabbed knives into the kitchen bench around her in anger and threatened to kill her, then after she left him, he killed her two children. Please do not make this incident about the colour of his skin. There are plenty of white narcissists too. If defending yourself against domestic violence is a stupid white conservatism idea, then so be it.

When you marry a sri lankan, you don't just marry the person. You marry the entire family as well. When your marriage life is in turmoil, you usually get the support from the both families. In Sri lanka most parents will work to keep their children's marriage going. But in western countries, it's the opposite. Having a child and getting a divorce generates a permanent income, specially for women. So it is very much encouraged.

Merry someone who has no unmarried sisters in the family. Educated and with good wider family relations.
